description.default: textfield with parameter value set to 'testing'
textfield with parameter value with a char_limit of `10`
textfield with parameter value set to 'default testing' by default
textfield with parameter value set to '""'
textfield with parameter value set to 'null'
textfield with parameter value set to 'undefined'
textfield with placeholder text 'Enter a string'

label.default: string Field control with really long control labels

description.default: textfield with error when set to 'error'
textfield with warning when set to 'warn'
Will be disabled when string_disabled or string_hidden are disabled or hidden if condition handling conditionHiddenPropertyHandling=null or conditionDisabledPropertyHandling=null
Type 'error' in `Standard` column to show an `error`. Type 'warn' in `Additional` column to show an `warn`
textfield error handing for long strings
